content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "bell", "quantity": 26, "index": 12}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 4, "index": 30}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 17, "index": 38}, {"type": "cookie", "quantity": 21, "index": 39}]

thought: To craft stripped_crimson_hyphae, I need to place 4 stripped_crimson_stem in the crafting grid in the shape of a square. I have 4 stripped_crimson_stems at slot 30, so I will start by moving one to the top left corner of the crafting grid, which is slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bell", "quantity": 26, "index": 12}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 17, "index": 38}, {"type": "cookie", "quantity": 21, "index": 39}]
thought: I now need to place the second stripped_crimson_stem to the right of the first one, which is slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "bell", "quantity": 26, "index": 12}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 2, "index": 30}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 17, "index": 38}, {"type": "cookie", "quantity": 21, "index": 39}]
thought: The third stripped_crimson_stem needs to go below the first one, which is slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "bell", "quantity": 26, "index": 12}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 17, "index": 38}, {"type": "cookie", "quantity": 21, "index": 39}]
thought: The final stripped_crimson_stem needs to go to the right of the third one, which is slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "bell", "quantity": 26, "index": 12}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 17, "index": 38}, {"type": "cookie", "quantity": 21, "index": 39}]
thought: The stripped_crimson_hyphae has been crafted, so I will move it to an empty slot in my inventory, eg., slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
